dcterms:creator: SemEval-2019 Task 3 Organizers
dcterms:description: A dataset for contextual emotion detection in text, containing conversations with user utterances and their emotions classified into four categories: Others, Happy, Sad, and Angry. The dataset includes 30,160 training conversations, 2,755 development conversations, and 5,509 test conversations.
dcterms:title: SemEval-2019 Task 3 Dataset
